sentences.sContent: Once again, you need to be careful not to tear or puncture the condom in this process.
sentences.sContent_eng: Once again, you need to be careful not to tear or puncture the condom in this process.
sentences.sCn: 再说一遍，你要小心，在这个过程中不要撕裂或戳穿避孕套。

sentences.sContent: Make sure you wash your hands after you handled a used condom and before you have any further contact with your partner.
sentences.sContent_eng: Make sure you wash your hands after you handled a used condom and before you have any further contact with your partner.
sentences.sCn: 在处理了使用过的避孕套后，以及在和你的性伴侣有进一步的性接触之前，你一定要洗手。

trans.tranOther: a thin rubber bag that a man wears over his  penis (= sex organ )  during sex, to prevent a woman having a baby or to protect against disease
